fields.comment: The number of future animation states evaluated to find the next state
fields.name: future_state_samples

fields.comment: Limb raycast length is (ground_attachment_ray_length_coeff * limb length)
fields.name: ground_attachment_ray_length_coeff

fields.comment: Limbs are moved towards target position at a pace affected by this value.
fields.name: leg_velocity_coeff

fields.comment: If set, will cause the mFlyingTime (in CharacterDataComponent) of the entity to be 0 or 1 depending on if the limbs are touching ground
fields.name: affect_flying

fields.comment: The movement score is multiplied by this value if a large move would occur
fields.name: large_movement_penalty_coeff

fields.comment: If a limb movement would make it not collide with ground, the movement score is multiplied with this value. Use lower values to make the limbs prioritize attaching to walls.
fields.name: no_ground_attachment_penalty_coeff

fields.comment: String name of material to not cast rays against. Defaults to 'aluminium'
fields.name: ray_skip_material

fields.comment: If 1, will apply verlet animation to simulate ragdoll-like limbs
fields.name: is_limp

fields.comment: Will be set to true if at least one leg is attached to ground.
fields.name: mHasGroundAttachmentOnAnyLeg
